entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:20 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -35.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arviat Airport 5:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -35.5°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -40.4°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 50 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
